segments.text: I guess so . Now Anna's got four kids and another on the way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow . She looks good for having had that many kids . She's pregnant and wearing Prada !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's Anna for you . She keeps up the image of the stylish Italian woman . Here she comes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's glowing . It must be the pregnancy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , or the expensive Italian facial treatments .
segments.speaker: S2
